title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 186 - Child Performers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 186 - Child Performers

State Regulations

Subpart 186-1 - Purposes, Scope And Exemptions (§ 186-1.1 to 186-1.3)

Subpart 186-2 - Definitions (§ 186-2.1)

Subpart 186-3 - Responsibilities Of Parents And Guardians (§ 186-3.1 to 186-3.6)

Subpart 186-4 - Responsibilities Of Employers (§ 186-4.1 to 186-4.7)

Subpart 186-5 - Educational Requirements (§ 186-5.1)

Subpart 186-6 - Hours And Conditions Of Work (§ 186-6.1 to 186-6.5)

Subpart 186-7 - Records; Contracts (§ 186-7.1 to 186-7.2)

Subpart 186-8 - Variances (§ 186-8.1)

Subpart 186-9 - Suspension Or Revocation Of Permits And Certificates (§ 186-9.1 to 186-9.3)

Subpart 186-10 - Penalties And Appeals (§ 186-10.1 to 186-10.11)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 186

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §154-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
